model.name: All the Palsson fluxes plus objective function flux in the E coli flux balance model

body.p: Glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate dehydrogenase-A complex, gapA, flux GAPAR
PPSA: PYR + ATP --> PEP + AMP + PI
Pyruvate Kinase I, pykF, flux PYKF
Pyruvate dehydrogenase, lpdA, aceE, aceF, flux ACEE
ACEE: PYR + COA + NAD --> NADH + CO2 + ACCOA
GND: D6PGC + NADP --> NADPH + CO2 + RL5P
Ribose-5-phosphate isomerase A, rpiA, flux RPIAR
ICDAR: ICIT + NADP <--> CO2 + NADPH + AKG
SUCA: AKG + NAD + COA --> CO2 + NADH + SUCCOA
SUCCR: SUCCOA + ADP + PI <--> ATP + COA + SUCC
ADHE2R: ACCOA + 2 NADH <--> ETH + 2 NAD + COA

Acetate kinase A, ackA, flux ACKAR
ACS: ATP + AC + COA --> AMP + PPI + ACCOA
PCKA: OA + ATP --> PEP + CO2 + ADP
MAEB: MAL + NADP --> CO2 + NADPH + PYR
SFCA: MAL + NAD --> CO2 + NADH + PYR
Malate synthase A, aceB, flux ACEB
NUOA: NADH + Q --> NAD + QH2 + 3.5 HEXT
FDOH: FOR + Q --> QH2 + CO2 + 2 HEXT
Cytochrome oxidase bo3, cyoA,cyoB,cyoC,cyoD,cycA,cydA,cydB, flux CYOA
Succinate dehydrogenase complex, sdhA,sdhB,sdhC,sdhD, flux SDHA2R

PNT2A: NADP + NADH + 2 HEXT --> NADPH + NAD
RIBUP: RIBxt --> RIB + ATP + ADP + PI
ATP drain flux for constant maintenance requirements, flux ATPM
Growth: Biomass --> BMxt + 23 ATP + 23 ADP + 23 PI

reaction.name: ATP drain flux for constant maintenance requirements
